HSRMod:Energy.NAME: Charge
DESCRIPTIONS: Maximum is #b%d. Some cards require #yCharge to use.

HSRMod:Toughness.NAME: Toughness
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage received is reduced by #b%d %%, stacking up to #b%d.
Damage received is increased by #b%d %%, stacking up to #b%d.

HSRMod:Broken.NAME: Broken
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases damage taken by #b%d %% and reduces damage dealt by #b%d %%. At the start of the turn, 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Frozen.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: When there are #b%d stacks (1/2/3 for normal/elite/BOSS enemies):
All stacks are removed at the start of the turn and the turn is skipped. NL After taking damage, 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Bleeding.NAME: Bleeding
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. At the start of the turn: take #b%d ( #b%d %% max HP, up to #b%d) physical damage (1), 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Burn.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take #b%d fire damage (1), 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Shock.NAME: Shock
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take #b%d lightning damage (1), 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:WindShear.NAME: Wind Shear
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take #b%d ( #b%dX , X equals to the amount, up to 5) wind damage (1), 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Imprison.NAME: Imprison
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt is reduced by #b%d %%. At the end of the turn, 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Entangle.NAME: Entangle
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds 1 stack when taking damage, up to #b%d stacks. At the start of the turn, remove all stacks and take damage equal to the number of stacks * #b%d.

HSRMod:BreakEffect.NAME: BreakEffect
DESCRIPTIONS: Break damage is increased by #b%d.

HSRMod:BreakEfficiency.NAME: BreakEfficiency
DESCRIPTIONS: Toughness shred value of elemental damage is increased by #b%d %%. At the end of the turn, 1 stack is removed.
Toughness shred value of elemental damage is increased by #b%d %%. At the end of the turn, if above #b%d stacks, 1 stack is removed.

HSRMod:Aftertaste.NAME: Aftertaste
DESCRIPTIONS: After dealing Follow Up card damage, consumes 10 Charge, deal #b%d damage to the target, and stack 1.

HSRMod:Suspicion.NAME: Suspicion
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases damage over time taken by #b%d %%. Stacks up to #b%d.

HSRMod:BrainInAVat.NAME: BrainInAVat
DESCRIPTIONS: After consuming Charge, remove 1 stack and recover an equal amount of Charge.

HSRMod:Reinforce.NAME: Reinforce
DESCRIPTIONS: When taking damage, if you have Block, gain a 'Girl Power' card.
When taking damage, if you have Block, gain #b%d Block and a 'Girl Power' card.

HSRMod:TopazNumby.NAME: TopazNumby
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, apply 1 stack (up to 2 stacks). If 2 stacks are present and no 'Trotter Market!?' is available, remove 2 stacks and gain 1 card.
After chasing, apply 1 stack (up to 2 stacks). If 2 stacks are present and no 'Trotter Market!?+' is available, remove 2 stacks and gain 1 card.

HSRMod:Aventurine.NAME: Aventurine
DESCRIPTIONS: When taking damage, if you have Block, stack #b%d. After Follow Up, stack #b%d, up to 10 stacks. When amount >=7, lose 7 amount to deal 1-7 Imaginary damage to a random enemy and gain 1-7 Block.

When taking damage, if you have Block, stack #b%d. After Follow Up, stack #b%d, up to 10 stacks. When amount >=7, lose 7 amount to deal 1-7 Imaginary damage to a random enemy, gain 1-7 Block, and if outside your turn, keep your block for next round.

HSRMod:Robin.NAME: Robin
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card, if it's a Follow Up card, gain 1 stack of 'TemporaryStrength'; otherwise, lose 1 stack of 'TemporaryStrength'.
After playing a card, if it's a Follow Up card, gain 1 stack of 'TemporaryStrength' and recover 20 Charge; otherwise, lose 1 stack of 'TemporaryStrength'.

HSRMod:ProofOfDebt.NAME: ProofOfDebt
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage from Follow Up attack cards is increased by #b%d. The target of the Follow Up attack is prioritized.

HSRMod:WisemansFolly.NAME: WisemansFolly
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, if 'CogitoErgoSum' is not in your hand, remove it. Upon removal, consume all 'CogitoErgoSum' cards in your hand.

HSRMod:BattlefieldMagician.NAME: BattlefieldMagician
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, gain #b%d Block.
After playing a Follow Up card, gain #b%d Block.

HSRMod:SlaughterhouseNo4RestInPeace.NAME: SlaughterhouseNo4RestInPeace
DESCRIPTIONS: After dealing Follow Up card damage, if the target has 'Broken', there is a #b%d %% chance to draw 1 card.
After dealing Follow Up card damage, if the target has/doesn't have 'Broken', there is a #b%d %%/20% chance to draw 1 card.

HSRMod:UselessScholar.NAME: UselessScholar
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, if you have any, there is a #b%d %% chance to consume #b%d Charge and Follow Up another Follow Up card.
After playing a Follow Up card, if you have any, there is a #b%d %% chance to consume #b%d Charge and Follow Up another Follow Up card.

HSRMod:BountyHunter.NAME: BountyHunter
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, there is a #b%d %% chance that the card will return to your hand.
After playing a Follow Up card, there is a #b%d %% chance that the card will return to your hand.

HSRMod:ThanatoplumRebloom.NAME: ThanatoplumRebloom
DESCRIPTIONS: When losing 'Broken', prevent it. When gaining Toughness, remove 1 stack and prevent it.

HSRMod:Trailblazer5.NAME: Trailblazer5
DESCRIPTIONS: After the first damage dealt by a played card, if the target has 'Broken', deal break damage equal to its toughness shred value.

HSRMod:Trailblazer6.NAME: Trailblazer6
DESCRIPTIONS: When dealing toughness shred damage, if the target has 'Broken', increase the damage by the absolute value of its Toughness.

HSRMod:Firefly.NAME: Firefly
DESCRIPTIONS: After breaking the target, deal break damage equal to its toughness max and gain 1 stack of 'Break Efficiency'. Add the card 'Falling From A Shattered Sky' to your hand.

HSRMod:Befog.NAME: Befog
DESCRIPTIONS: After being broken, recover #b%d [E] , draw #b%d cards, and upgrade all current hand cards for this battle.

HSRMod:Symbiote.NAME: Symbiote
DESCRIPTIONS: After breaking the target, recover [E] [E] . After dealing break damage, draw 1 card.

HSRMod:VoyageMonitor.NAME: VoyageMonitor
DESCRIPTIONS: After breaking the target, gain Toughness equal to its toughness max.
After breaking the target, gain Toughness equal to its toughness max. After dealing break damage, gain 1 stack of Toughness.

HSRMod:IntersegmentalMembrane.NAME: IntersegmentalMembrane
DESCRIPTIONS: For each [E] consumed, gain #b%d Block.

HSRMod:Kolchis.NAME: Kolchis
DESCRIPTIONS: After consuming Charge, recover [E] . After consuming [E] , recover #b%d Charge.

HSRMod:Divinity.NAME: Divinity
DESCRIPTIONS: Block gain is increased by #b%d %%, and at the start of the turn, only #b%d %% of current Block is lost.

HSRMod:Burden.NAME: Burden
DESCRIPTIONS: After becoming the target of a card, remove 1 stack and recover [E] .

HSRMod:Huohuo.NAME: Huohuo
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card, recover 1 HP, 10 Charge, and remove 1 stack of a random negative effect.

HSRMod:Epiphany.NAME: Epiphany
DESCRIPTIONS: When triggering DoT effects, the stack is not removed, but 1 stack is removed at the end of the turn.

HSRMod:SlashedDream.NAME: SlashedDream
DESCRIPTIONS: After using a card, if it applied a debuff, stack 1 , stacking up to 12. NL At the end of the turn, if amount >=9, lose 9 amount and bounce 3 times: deal #b%d lightning damage (1) to random enemies; finally, deal #b%d + X lightning damage (1) to all enemies (X equals the number of its debuffs).
I  #rweep  #rfor  #rthe  #rdeparted.
Dusks  #rrain,  #rit  #rtoo  #rshall  #rfall.

HSRMod:AllThingsArePossible.NAME: AllThingsArePossible
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing an attack card, apply 1 DoT effect that the target doesn't already have.
After playing an attack card, if the target has all DoT effects, randomly trigger one. Otherwise, apply 1 that it doesn't already have.

HSRMod:AnExtraPersonsDiary.NAME: AnExtraPersonsDiary
DESCRIPTIONS: Toughness shred value of DoT effects +1. After breaking the target (X is the first digit of its toughness max), apply 1 random negative effect X times and draw X cards.

Toughness shred value of DoT effects +1. After breaking the target (X is the first digit of its toughness max), apply 1 random negative effect X times, draw X cards, and it loses X stacks of Strength.

HSRMod:ReignOfKeys.NAME: ReignOfKeys
DESCRIPTIONS: When enemies trigger DoT effects during their turn, draw 1 card. If it triggers outside of their turn, stacks are not reduced.
When enemies trigger DoT effects, draw 1 card. If it triggers outside of their turn, stacks are not reduced.

HSRMod:FuneralOfSensoryPursuivant.NAME: FuneralOfSensoryPursuivant
DESCRIPTIONS: After the enemy takes DoT, apply #b%d stacks of 'Suspicion'.
After the enemy takes DoT, apply #b%d stacks of 'Suspicion'. When enemies are inflicted with DoT, apply #b%d stacks of 'Suspicion'.

HSRMod:CommonMortal.NAME: CommonMortal
DESCRIPTIONS: After consuming charge, apply 1 DoT effect to a random enemy. When you apply a DoT effect, gain #b%d charge.
After consuming charge, apply 1 DoT effect to a random enemy. When you apply a negative effect, gain #b%d charge.
